title: Ticket #7096: SubmitResult.num_procs() wrong for late materialization
description:
Quick diagnostic script below, which submits a cluster with late materialization enabled: 

import htcondor

sub = htcondor.Submit({"executable": "/bin/sleep", "arguments": "1", "max_idle": "5"})

print("submit", sub)

schedd = htcondor.Schedd()
with schedd.transaction() as txn:
    result = sub.queue_with_itemdata(txn, 5)

print(result)
print("clusterid", result.cluster())
print("clusterad", result.clusterad())
print("first_proc", result.first_proc())
print("num_procs", result.num_procs())

This will report that num_procs is 0 for any count. TJ suspects that it looks for the number of materialized jobs at submit time.
creator: karpel
